bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with ke wu 客忤 , visitor’s hostility. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 11: 蜥蜴丸，治癥堅 水腫、蜚屍、遁屍、百注、屍注、骨血相注，惡氣鬼忤，蠱毒、邪氣往 來 , “Pills with skink cure concretion-illness hardness and water swelling, gadfly corpse [qi], run-away corpse [qi], the hundred influxes, corpse [qi] influx, mutual influx between bones and blood, malign qi and demon hostility , gu poison, and evil qi that come and go”.
